title: The Future of Reading conference announced
content: [[http://futureofreading.cias.rit.edu/RIT%20Future%20of%20Reading%20Conference.html|The Future of Reading conference]] will be held at the [Rochester Institute of Technology](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131025851/http:/www.rit.edu/), 12â€“19 June, 2010.
author: Christopher Dean

comments.content: Thanks for the heads up, Chris.

Cool.  
Not quite sure what "the Art of Literacy" means, though.
